@mrbenjaminlaw I just had 4 days without phone coverage or access to news. There was great peace in my temporary ignorance.
@janecat60 So much I couldn't fit it like she plays the cello, rowed at Cambridge and enjoys fly fishing. I have wasted my life.
I am only making it through summer courtesy of a raging quinine addiction.

This is an interesting one - can a pollie be "personally pro life" but still govern for all women (ie those who areâ€¦ https://t.co/ZBb58AHrLZ
@jamesmassola Which is surprising given how mild everyone's opinions about everything else are.
@DavieBoySmiling I thought the same thing!
From yours truly - "Susan Kiefel rewrites script, sworn in as first female Chief Justice of the High Court" https://t.co/xSh4lxxBUK via @smh
ICYMI @ellinghausen picture of Roger Federer at last night's Australian Open final. https://t.co/qOf7rRGBQq
FM Julie Bishop to ask President Trump to exempt Australians from immigration ban, @davidwroe reports - https://t.co/rgGhCVWEph via @smh
So - did the PM offer not to criticise Trump's ban in exchange for the refugee deal being honoured or was it a condition imposed on him?
PM is asked if he thinks Trump's ban in discriminatory: "Our borders are secure. That is the bottom line. We are not complacent."
PM on Trump ban: "It is not my job as Prime Minister of Australia to run commentary on the domestic policies of other countries."
PM says refugee deal re people on Manus and Nauru is a matter that is "entirely in the hands of the US government refugee agencies".
PM says he and Trump agreed it is "vital that every country should control who gets to come across its borders".
PM is with Immigration Minister Peter Dutton and says he had a "constructive" conversation with US President Trump yesterday.
Since when did the PM make "press statements"?
@DeborahRStaines Was it! HC hair styles aren't my specialty. But I know my shoes.
@laureningram You can always wear killer shoes w even the most conservative suit.
Warning - this tweet contains trivia. Susan Kiefel is rocking a pair of Nicholas Kirkwood heels for her swearing in. https://t.co/H6HSCmGPQI
Hard to tell if the legal establishment feels Kiefel's gender or home state of Qld was the greater obstacle in her path to success.
Head of the Law Council says Kiefel's appointment is "a powerful and enduring image of equality".
Speeches at Susan Kiefel's swearing in mentioning not only her fine legal achievements but skills as a cook, trout angler, rower & actress.
AG George Brandis is at the HC for Susan Kiefel's swearing in. He's wearing full lawyers' garb including a wig.
@steph_gardiner What abt the crying parents? I was dismissed from my daughter's first day last year for being embarrassing.
@JamilaRizvi It's from Adam which I though was a person is actually a group - Addressing Discrimination Against Men.
First day back at work and found this on my desk. Ah well, off to the High Court for Susan Kiefel's swearing in. https://t.co/LdaksAm65G
All the very best to the little people starting school for the first time this week. Go well.
